pullRequest.title: Record database metadata
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Record the settings that were used when the database was created to a metadata.yml file which is reloaded allowing us to change the values for new databases without having to introduce a new database version.
To make experimentation with different database configuration easier, values which can be changed without restarting the database can be added to the metadata.yml file (manually) and they will be loaded.  This avoids the need to add a bunch of -X options to the command line.
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.
